description:
Shirone (a pun on shiro neko, white cat) serves as animal sidekick for http://anidb.net/ch11892 [Magical Kyouko] in her show.
Is based on a http://anidb.net/ch11894 [similar character] from http://anidb.net/cr2985 [Yabuki Kentarou]`s other manga/anime series http://anidb.net/a3321 [Black Cat].
name: Shirone
